message.name: ERR_EXTERNALPARTY_FV_TYPE
message.locale: The external party type must be entered.

message.name: ERR_EXTERNALPARTY_FV_NAME
message.locale: The external party name must be entered.

message.name: ERR_EXTERNALPARTY_FV_REGISTRATION_DATE
message.locale: The registration date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_EXTERNALPARTY_XFV_REG_DATE_LARGE
message.locale: The registration date must not be later than today.

message.name: ERR_EXTERNALPARTY_REFERENCE_NUM_ALREADY_EXISTS
message.locale: A Participant with Reference Number "%1s" already exists

message.name: ERR_PUBLIC_OFFICE_CANCELED
message.locale: A public office with status of 'Canceled' cannot be selected.
A public office with a status of 'Cancelled' cannot be selected.

message.name: ERR_PUBLIC_OFFICE_CLOSED
message.locale: A public office with a status of 'Closed' cannot be selected.

message.name: ERR_EXTERNALPARTY_XFV_REG_DATE_END_DATE
message.locale: The end date must not be earlier than the registration date.

message.name: ERR_EXTERNALPARTY_CLOSED
message.locale: The external party is 'Closed' and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_EXTERNALPARTY_XFV_VERIFICATION_IND_TYPE
message.locale: The verification indicator value must be selected when an external party of type "%1s" is selected.

message.name: ERR_REFERENCE_NUM_ALREADY_EXISTS_AS_PRIMARY_ALT_ID
message.locale: This reference number is already used as a primary alternative ID for another client.
